entry.p1: Today was a great day. I had a productive morning reading a good book.
entry.p2: The weather was beautiful, so I took a walk in the afternoon and enjoyed the sunshine.
entry.p3: Overall, I'm feeling happy and content.

mood.anime: Watching an episode of my favorite show

entry.paragraph1: Today was a bit stressful, but I managed to make progress on my project.
entry.paragraph2: I needed some relaxation after work, so I played a game and watched some anime.
entry.paragraph3: Hopefully, tomorrow will be a calmer day.
